name: Bucket List
description:
DID I GRAB YOUR ATTENTION?

PLEASE! Help Jon complete his bucket list before he dies in 6 months, can you do it? Take Jon through all his adventures from traveling the world to skydiving.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features include!

  • 4 challenging levels 
  • Cool retro graphics (I totally wasn't lazy when I made them)
  • 3 original music tracks
  • Crazy action sequences
  • Did I mention the crazy action sequences!?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
